channel.title: [317][ALREADY CODED BY ME] Need Hoster![ALREADY CODED BY ME][317]
channel.description:
Hello my Moparscapian friends. I first got interested in Moparscape about a year ago, and slowly, I have learned. Now, I know how to code almost anything. I started with a 317 server named Fatality, and I was hosting it. In a day, it grew up 10 people. Then for some reason, my brother turned off the router (he has the main router, i have a wireless connection to the main router in his room). Now I can't host anymore. So If you could tell me how to fix everything so I can host again, or if you could help me host. We could talk about your benefits for hosting my server I created/coded. Here are some screenies of the server (On localhost) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- teleports for minigames. [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/teleports-minigameteleports.jpg[/img] to make cash theive stalls [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/stalls-theiving.jpg[/img] NEW, BETTER, UPDATED ABYSSAL WHIP! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/newepicabyssalwhip.jpg[/img] WORKING BARROWS! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/minigames-barrows.jpg[/img] This is home! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/home.jpg[/img] Godsword stances for all godswords! ( only show ags in picture) [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/gsstances.jpg[/img] Godsword run animation [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/godswordrunanimation.jpg[/img] TONS OF CUSTOMS! JUST FEW OF MANY! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/custompics.jpg[/img] New whip attack animation! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/abyssalwhip-new-attackanimation.jpg[/img] New whip in inventory! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/abyssalwhip-new-inventorymodel.jpg[/img] New whip in drop model! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/abyssalwhip-new-dropmodel.jpg[/img] Monster Teleports! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/teleports-monsterteleport.jpg[/img] WORKING iPanel! [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/workingipanel1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/workingipanel2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/workingipanel3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/workingipanel4.jpg[/img] DEATH CAPE!@#!@#!@#!@#!@#!@ BLACK WINGS!@#!@#!@ TOP HAT!@#!@#!@ [IMG]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af223/heatscape/picture.jpg[/img]
---- Also, there is staffzone, and a staff only shop. Shops are at edgeville, a little bit south of the theiving stalls. If you can host, please reply to this thread and/or pm me. Please and Thank you.
